mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${table} ( id, tenant_id, ${key}, sequence_no, document_title, document_url, upload_date, created_by ) SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 FROM ${table} ), #{tenantId}, #{ownerCode}, (SELECT IFNULL(max(sequence_no),0)+1 FROM ${table} WHERE tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND ${key}=#{ownerCode}), #{documentTitle}, concat(#{document},(SELECT IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 FROM ${table}),'_', #{encodeFileName}), now(), #{updatedBy} FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT sequence_no as sequenceNo, document_title as documentIitle, document_url as documentUrl, upload_date as uploadDate FROM ${table} WHERE tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND ${key}=#{ownerCode} ORDER BY sequenceNo,created_at
